description: Paul`s Gyarados was the first Pok√©mon sent out to battle Ash`s Lucario during the Training Battle at Oak`s Laboratory. It was meant to emulate Lance`s Gyarados (Red Gyarados) in preparation for Ash Ketchum`s entry into the Masters Tournament. It was defeated by Ash`s Lucario`s Bullet Punch.
name: Gyarados (Shinji)
